Soulstice, chill. Look at yourself before blaiming others. When 
Deemos was at large, you had his group going around and attacking 
factions, and you did take your own bots hostage. 






--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "SOULSTICE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> OOC: Ohhh, nice, who is this code you keep talking about? I hope 
you are not
> talking to me, since I am Soulstice. This code must be someone I 
don't know.
> What you say is not fitting at all, Chordate getting kidnapped? You 
seem to
> me to be prejudice towards the Maximals. I am the mouthpiece for 
EVERYONE
> when I say that it seems you sabotage everything the Maximals do to 
insure a
> victory for the Alliance. Prove me wrong...
